t: Amazon.com: KANEYAMA RAMEN (KYUSHU TONKOTSU) - 12Packs/Box (24 Servings)
s: I’m no ramen expert, but I do enjoy eating authentic ramen and love eating instant ramen. That being said I bought the Kaneyama brand because I’ve been craving tonkotsu ramen so badly during this quarantine. All I added was a soft-boiled egg and it was really good.
